```{r}
distinct_df_accused %>%
 ggplot() +
  aes(x = FINDING_CODE, fill = FINDING_CODE) +
  geom_bar() +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = list(
      ADDITIONALINFOREQ = "darkblue",
      EXONERATED = "darkblue",
      NO AFFIDAVIT = "darkblue",
      NOT SUSTAINED = "darkblue",
      SUSTAINED = "darkred",
      UNFOUNDED = "darkblue"
    )
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Case Finding",
    y = "Total",
    title = "Case Findings of All Allegations"
  ) +
  theme_gray()
```
